name: registration_check
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sa_rego_check.
Tool description: returns the registration details of your South Australia-registered vehicle or boat.
Information returned from this check includes:
Make
Primary Colour
Expiry Date 
body or hull type
compulsory third-party (CTP) insurer (vehicles only)
heavy vehicle details (gross vehicle, combination, or trailer mass).

rego.description: The registration number of the vehicle to be checked.
